title.en: An Elite Alpha's Instinct to Love ~The Beautiful Beast Won't Let Go of His Destiny~

altTitles.ja: 極級α様の溺愛本能 美獣オネエは運命を離さない

description.en: Forgive me, okay...? I can't stop myself. Kasumi, a beta, works as a manager at a talent agency. All the boyfriends that she's dated have all gotten involved with omegas. Kasumi's only solace as an ordinary beta background character is popular influencer K. K is a feminine alpha that's unaffiliated with an agency, and no one knows what he looks like beneath his mask. One day on the way home from work, Kasumi runs into K who she's admired so much!! It's a perfect chance to scout him... But all of a sudden, Kasumi's body starts heating up...? With just a touch, an overwhelming pleasure pierces through her entire body. "So that’s how much you want me, huh?" Even though she's supposed to be a beta, she's gone into heat!? What's K's true identity? Confounded with her omega gender that's intertwined with instinct, romance, and destiny, Kasumi looks to the future and learns to love. A brand new omegaverse love story!
